channel.title: Making myself an owner [718]
channel.description: so everytime i try to make myself owner it doesn't seem to work.. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/da52ddbd2355bf861bf2fc087f0d1063.png[/img] and then once i get in game it doesnt show me as owner.. [img]http://gyazo.com/d9784374c484f0601755e5440091bf52[/img] am i maybe missing something?

item.title: Making myself an owner [718]
item.dc:creator: @BeerChug BeerChug
item.description:
@BeerChug wrote:

This is how I corrected this!

server\src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java

[spoiler]
if (Settings.DEBUG)
Logger.log(this, "Initiated player: " + username + ", pass: " + password);
if (username.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownername”)) {
rights = 7;
[/spoiler]

Cheers!

Read full topic
